name: Cluttered Space
description:
_______________________________________________________________

This is a fun space ship game. The player's goal is to manuever through the obstacles in their spaceship while collecting powerups. The player gains score when they destroy the enemy ships. After 2 minutes the player has completed the level and can move on to the next. There are only five levels but it is really fun.

INSTRUCTIONS:

To move the player use the WASD keys.

To shoot projectiles press left ctrl or left click.

_______________________________________________________________
